name: Vinyl Cycle
description:
Overview

Vinyl Cycle is a Top-Down Rhythm Endless Runner Game. The goal is to hit as many notes as possible while the speed of the record goes up. Try and achieve the biggest time! This was produced for the Extra Credits Game Jam #3

Features

  • Rhythm
  • Endless Runner

Controls

  • Xbox A Button/Keyboard Z Key - Green Block
  • Xbox X Button/Keyboard X Key - Blue Block
  • Xbox Y Button/Keyboard C Key - Yellow Block
  • Xbox B Button/Keyboard V Key - Red Block
  • R - Restart
  • Escape - Quit
